document_data.name: Sharna
document_data.mainbody: '''Sharna''' was the oldest and preeminent of [[Vhaemas the Bastard]]'s children.
document_data.History:
Sharna was born in [[1340 DR]] to Vhaemas and [[Eaja Kamaar]].

She participated in the [[Twelfth Serôs War]] following her father at [[Iakhovas]]'s side.
document_data.Personality: Sharna was full of hate for her grandfather. She was a capable leader for her people.
